author: Jeronimo Backes
title: Free Commerce payment gateway
description: Enabling the sales of goods and services for crypto requires intermediaries who control the seller's money and charge fees/commissions.

assessments.note: A payment gateway is very much needed to build e-commerce websites. However, there are already existing solutions such as nowpayments.io
assessments.reply: NowPayments deals with shopify only. It's neither decentralized, nor commission free.

assessments.note: This could be a useful DApp. But should it not be in the DApps and integrations challenge?
assessments.reply: This is a project to enable developers to easly allow processing payments in their applications (websites, mobile apps, etc). Not a dApp, not even close.

assessments.note: This proposal addresses Cardano Fund 5: Developer Ecosystem. The project proposal is solid and can impact many people seeking to pay for services and product without paying a large transfer fee to a third party.
There is already a prototype implemented, which helps to lower the implementation risks. The proposer has some code on GitHub. The code quality is average.
The Roadmap is clear and provides an in-depth, step-by-step action plan, making this project easier to audit

solution: To build an intermediary & commission-free payment gateway where native tokens (esp. stablecoins) & ADA flow directly from buyer to seller.
experience: Tech Lead with 20+ years of software development experience, masters degree in computer science, creator of multiple open-source projects.
